scripts.build: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path dist) { Remove-Item dist -Recurse -Force }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path dist; esbuild src/background/background.js src/cs/cs_app.js src/core/main.js src/cs/cs_teams.js src/cs/cs_validator.js --bundle --outdir=dist --format=iife; Copy-Item -Path manifest.json -Destination dist/; Copy-Item -Path assets -Destination dist/ -Recurse"
